For Sedem, he contributed to the magazines Neutron and Sexbulles, and produced the album 'Mike the Bike et Molly' (1982). He was present at GlÃƒÂ©nat with 'CaraÃƒÂ¯bes' (1981) and 'Voyage Intemporel' (1982), before creating the 'Vic Voyage' series. This mystical and adventurous series, about a man who discovers his extraterrestrial origins, began in Circus magazine in 1982. Later on, it was continued at Aedena publishers and Vaisseau d'Argent.
